Title: Add location to overview
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user, I want to search for a city/town and save it to an overview where I can see quick facts about their weather data.

## Description
After opening the app, the user is presented with ListView, a list of added locations with their current temperature. By clicking on the plus button, one is presented with a search bar which offers suggestions when searching, after choosing a new location, the location will be saved in the list.
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic

Title: Current weather forecast for one location
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user I want to tap on a city in the list overview and look at the current weather forecast (like Temperature, Humidity, Wind, UV-Index, Rain).
## Description
After clicking on a location from the list, one is presented with a view of current weather data (LocationView). After scrolling down, one will be presented with the weather forecast for the next 7 days ([User Story 3](#3)) .
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic

Title: Show weather forecast for the next 7 days
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user, I'd like to select a saved location and see the weather forecast for the next 7 days.
## Description
After scrolling down in the LocationView one is presented with weather forecast for the next 7 days. There might be an option for clicking on a day and being presented with a LocationView for that day.
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic

Title: Show weather forecast for one location by date
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user, I'd like to select a saved location in the overview and see how the weather conditions were on a specific date.
## Description
In LocationView one can change data for that location and recall any day from over 60 years back in time and view its weather data in LocationView.
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic

Title: Comparing the weather data of two dates
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user, I'd like to see/compare a monthly heatmap for different weather data (weather forecast or from history).
## Description
By tapping on chart button in LocationView, the user will be presented with a ChartView, where weather data of 2 days can be compared on the chart.
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic

Title: Showing climate/temperature changes between two dates with ambient color changes
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user, I'd like to see the weather changes for a saved location and a specific day in the year trough history visualized with changes of the background colour of the app.
## Description
By tapping the slide button in LocationView, the user will be presented with the DayHistoryView, where one specific day in the year can be chosen, for example 15. November. By using a slider, the user can see changes in temperature for 15. November for all years in history. Temperature will be reflected in background colour and as a text output.
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic

Title: Setting C°/F°
Description:
## User Story
> As an app user, I'd like to be able to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit units.
## Description
By tapping on the wheel button in ListView, the user can choose metric or imperial units for represented data.
Author: Milos Stojiljkovic
